name: ALAY URBAN RANGERS TRIP
description: The idea of this trip is especially arranged for you who wants to feel the excitement and met some locals vibe in the heart of Jakarta. It's a budget trip, more interactions with public, so it's far from luxurious things that might you've done before, and more advantages that you can get is about to learn and know the social lifes. it's very suitable for you who like a streets photograph, adventurous spirit, chalenged, and curious about real Jakarta, and all of the cost of this trip can be adjusted from the detail expenses that we will spend*. So Let's Go
